name: timezone_for_location
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool world_time.
Tool description: WorldTimeAPI is a simple web service which returns the local-time for a given timezone as either JSON or plain-text. Some additional information is provided, such as whether that timezone is currently in Daylight Savings Time, when DST starts and ends, the UTC offset, etc.
API description: Fetch the current time for a given location and area using the World Time API.

location.description: The specific location for which to fetch the time (e.g., "London").

area.description: The larger area or region that the location falls within (e.g., "Europe").
